callSite.snippet: assembly ("memory-safe") {let success := call(gas(), token, 0, add(data, 0x20), mload(data), 0, 0x20)// bubble errorsif iszero(success) {let ptr := mload(0x40)returndatacopy(ptr, 0, returndatasize())revert(ptr, returndatasize())}returnSize := returndatasize()returnValue := mload(0)}

comments.callee resolution: callee contract unresolved; callee sighash resolved

comments.callee resolution hint (1): To resolve the call, try '--struct_link SablierFlow:token=[CONTRACT]'

comments.havoc cause: The Prover could not resolve the callee, thus, havoc'd the call

comments.havoc scope: a havoc that havocs all contracts except SablierFlow (ce4604a0000000000000000000000025)

message.text: assuming contracts in scene with non-empty bytecode have EXTCODESIZE larger than zero
assuming address(0).code has no code deployed
assumptions about uniqueness of contracts' addresses
establish equivalence of extension and base contract immutables
